page.title: 04Education
page.content: The schools that the children of Elberton go to for primary are: {Redwick and Northwick, {Oldbury, Olveston. The majority of these go to Olveston,and a very small minority go to Redwick and Northwick.The remains go to Oldbury. There are 175 pupils,and 6 teachers at Olveston primary.The school itself will be 150 years old next year. There used to be schools at Littleton and at Oldtown,but these closed down due to financial reasons.Olveston took on the intake of pupils from these two schools.The catchment area for Olveston school is flexible;pupils come from{Severn Beach,Almondsbury, {Northwick(and Redwick),}but like all smaller schools,the numbers are dropping and more children go to { {Silverhill,}or other private schools.
